alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Jones; Shackelford; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 9:19PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Callahan, southeastern Jones, southern Shackelford and northeastern Taylor Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 918 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kirby Lake, or near Abilene, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Clyde, Baird, Wylie, Tye, Hawley, Buffalo Gap, Moran, Putnam, Atwell, Eula, Dudley, Potosi, Hamby, Caps, Dyess Afb, Impact, Lake Fort Phantom Hill, Us-283 Near The Callahan- Shackelford County Line and I-20 Near The Callahan- Eastland County Line. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 277 and 323. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
